title: Update Geological Block Model
description: A resource geologist incorporates new drillhole assay data into the geological block model to refine the resource estimate.

tasks.description: Import and validate the new drillhole data, checking for errors in location, depth, and assay values.
tasks.expected_outcome: New drillhole data is successfully imported and validated in the geology software.

tasks.description: Run a geostatistical estimation (e.g., kriging) to interpolate grades from the drillholes into the block model.
tasks.expected_outcome: The block model grades are updated based on the new data.

tasks.description: Generate a new resource tonnage and grade report and compare it with the previous version.
tasks.expected_outcome: A report is generated showing an increase in indicated resources.
